src_original: dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca /  tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /  idamucyate dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānam /  satyaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ punaranekavidham /  avitathārthena tāvadekameva satyaṃ na dvitīyamasti /
tgt_original: 諸施設建立者，謂諸菩薩四種施設建立。 唯有如來及諸菩薩能正施設建立，非餘一切若天若人、若沙門若婆羅門所能施設建立，除竊佛法安置己論。 何等為四？ 一法施設建立、二諦施設建立、三道理施設建立、四乘施設建立。 法施設建立者，謂素怛纜等十二分教次第撰集、次第安置、次第製造，是名法施設建立。

src_original: dvividhaṃ satyam /  saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /

src_original: trividhaṃ satyam /  lakṣaṇasatyaṃ vāksatyaṃ kriyāsatyaṃ ca /

src_original: ṣaḍvidhaṃ [satyam] /  satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca /

src_original: aṣṭavidhaṃ [satyaṃ] /  saṃskāraduḥkhatāsatyaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ pravṛttisatyaṃ nivṛtisatyaṃ saṃkleśasatyaṃ vyavadānasatyaṃ samyakprayogasatyaṃ ca /

src_original: navavidhaṃ [satyam] /  anityasatyaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyatāsatyaṃ nairātmyasatyaṃ [bhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ] (Dutt 199)  vibhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ tatprahāṇopāyasatyaṃ sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ [ca] /
tgt_original: 或立九諦，一無常諦、二苦諦、三空諦、四無我諦、五有愛諦、六無有愛諦、七彼斷方便諦、八有餘依涅槃諦、九無餘依涅槃諦。

src_original: daśavidhaṃ satyam /  aupakramikaduḥkhasatyaṃ bhogavaikalyaduḥkhasatyaṃ dhāturvaiṣamyaduḥkhasatyaṃ priyavipariṇāmaduḥkhasatyaṃ  dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhasatyaṃ karmasatyaṃ kleśasatyaṃ tathā śravaṇayoniśomanaskārasatyaṃ  samyakdṛṣṭisatyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiphalasatyaṃ ceti /

src_original: idamucyate bodhisattvānāṃ satyaprajñaptivyavasthānam /  prabhedaśaḥ punaretadapramāṇa veditavyam /

src_original: yathā śrāvakayānamevaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaprajñaptivyavasthānam /

src_original: tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati /  sa caturtho 'prameyaḥ /

src_original: yaścopāyasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ vimokṣāya sa pañcamoprameyaḥ /

src_original: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante /

src_original: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 是名五種宣說廣大果利益應知。

src_original: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 大乘性者，謂菩薩乘與七大性相應故，說名大乘。

src_original: katamāni sapta /
tgt_original: 云何為七？

src_original: dharmamahattvam /  tadyathā dvādaśāṅgādvacogatād bodhisattvapiṭakavaipulyam /
tgt_original: 一法大性，謂十二分教中菩薩藏所攝方廣之教。

src_original: cittotpādamahattvam /  tadyathā ekatyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 二發心大性，謂已發無上正等覺心。

src_original: adhimuktimahattvam /  tadyathaikatyaḥ tasminneva ca dharmamahattve 'dhimukto bhavati /
tgt_original: 三勝解大性，謂於前所說法大性境起勝信解。

src_original: adhyāśayamahattvam /  tadyathaikatyaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmiṃ (Dutt 202)  samatikramyādhyāśayaśuddhibhūmimanupraviśati /
tgt_original: 四勝意樂大性，謂已超過勝解行地入淨勝意樂地。

src_original: sambhāramahattvam /  yasya puṇyasambhārasya jñānasambhārasya samudāgamādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambudhyate /
tgt_original: 五資糧大性，謂已成就福智二種大資糧故，能證無上正等菩提。

src_original: kālamahattvam /  yena kālena yaistribhiṣkalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
tgt_original: 六時大性，謂三大劫阿僧企耶時能證無上正等菩提。

src_original: samudāgamamahattvam /  saivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
tgt_original: 七成滿大性，謂即無上正等菩提。

src_original: yasyātmabhāvasamudāgamasyānyaḥ ātmabhāvasamudāgamaḥ samo nāsti /  kutaḥ punaruttari kuto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 此所成滿菩提自體，比餘成滿自體尚無與等，何況超勝此中法大性乃至時大性。

src_original: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ  yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya /  tatpunarekaṃ samudāgama-mahattvaṃ phalasthānīyameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ veditavyam /  aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /  bodhisattvapiṭakadeśanā /
tgt_original: 此之六種是成滿大性之因，成滿大性一種是前六之果應知。

src_original: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /  tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /  tasya ca yadyoniśaḥ śravaṇam /  yoniśaśca cintāpūrvakamadhyāśayopagamanam /  adhyāśayopagamanapūrvaṃkaśca bhāvanākārapraveśaḥ /  bhāvanākārapraveśapūrvikā ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpattiḥ /  taśyā eva ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpatteratyantanairyāṇikatā /
tgt_original: 攝者，謂八種法能具足攝一切大乘，一菩薩藏教、二於菩薩藏中顯示諸法真實義教、三於菩薩藏中顯示一切諸佛菩薩不可思議最勝廣大甚深威德教、四於上所說如理聽聞、五先如理思趣勝意樂、六得勝意樂入初修行、七由入修行為先故修果成就、八由修果成就故究竟出離。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩由如是修學，證得無上正等菩提。

src_original: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /  te samāsato daśa veditavyāḥ /  gotrasthaḥ /  avatīrṇaḥ /  aśuddhāśayaḥ /  śuddhāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩十應知者，謂如是修學能證無上正等菩提諸菩薩，略有十種應知。

src_original: aparipakvaḥ /  paripakvaḥ /  aniyatipatitaḥ /  niyatipatitaḥ /  ekajātipratibaddhaḥ /  caramabhavikaśceti /
tgt_original: 一安住種性、二趣入、三不淨勝意樂、四淨勝意樂、五未成熟、六已成熟、七未得決定、八已得決定、九一生所繫、十住最後有。

src_original: tatra gotrastho bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaścittamutpādayati /  so 'vatīrṇa ityucyate /
tgt_original: 此中安住種性菩薩，若方便修學發菩提心，即名趣入。

src_original: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 既趣入已，乃至未入淨勝意樂地，即名不淨勝意樂；

src_original: praviṣṭastu śuddhāśayo bhavati /
tgt_original: 若得入者，名淨勝意樂。

src_original: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate /
tgt_original: 即淨勝意樂菩薩乃至未入到究竟地，名未成熟；

src_original: praviṣṭastu paripakvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 若得入者，名已成熟。

src_original: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau (Dutt 203)  vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaniyata ityucyate /
tgt_original: 即未成熟中乃至未入決定行地，名不決定；

src_original: praviṣṭastu niyato bhavati /
tgt_original: 若得入者，名得決定。

src_original: sa eva punaḥ paripakvau dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 已成熟中復有二種：

src_original: ekajātipratibaddho yasya janmano 'nantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /  caramabhavikaśca tasminneva janmani sthito 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
tgt_original: 一、一生所繫，謂此生後無間證得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 二、住最後有，謂即在此生證得無上正等菩提。

src_original: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /  ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /  yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是從住種性乃至無上正等菩提，如前所說十種菩薩盡攝一切菩薩。

src_original: sa punarayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ janako bhavati /
tgt_original: 八種分別能生三事。

src_original: tatra vikalpaprapañcavastvāśrayā satkāyadṛṣṭirasmimānaśca /  satkāyadṛṣṭyasmimānāśritā rāgadveṣamohāḥ /  ebhiśca tribhirvastubhiḥ sarvalokānāṃ pravṛttipakṣo niravaśeṣaḥ paridīpito bhavati /
tgt_original: 一分別戲論所依緣事、二見我慢事、三貪愛等事。

src_original: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ katamaḥ /  rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni rūpamityevamādiryo vikalpaḥ /  ayamucyate svabhāvavikalpaḥ /
tgt_original: 八種分別者，一自性分別，謂於色等想事分別色等所有自性。

src_original: viśeṣavikalpaḥ katamaḥ /  tasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ayaṃ rūpī ayamarūpī ayaṃ sanidarśano 'yamanidarśana evaṃ sapratigho 'pratighaḥ /  sāsravo 'nāsravaḥ saṃskṛto 'saṃskṛtaḥ kuśalo 'kuśalo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ
tgt_original: 二差別分別，謂即於色等想事起諸分別，此有色此無色、此有見此無見、此有對此無對，如是等無量差別，以自性分別為依處故，分別種種差別之義。

src_original: pratyutpanna ityevaṃbhāgīyenāpramāṇena prabhedanayena yā svabhāvavikalpādhiṣṭhānā  tadviśiṣṭārthavikalpanā /  ayamucyate viśeṣavikalpaḥ /  piṇḍagrāhavikalpaḥ katamaḥ /  yastasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ātmasattva jīvajantusaṃjñāsaṃketopasaṃhitaḥ
tgt_original: 三總執分別，謂即於色等想事所立我及有情命者生者等假想施設所引分別，由於積聚多法總執為因分別轉故。

src_original: piṇḍiteṣu bahuṣu dharmeṣu piṇḍagrāhahetukaḥ pravartate gṛhasenāvanādiṣu bhojanapānayānavastrādiṣu  ca tatsaṃjñāsaṃketopasaṃhitaḥ /  ayamucyate piṇḍagrāhavikalpaḥ /
tgt_original: 又於舍軍林等及於飲食衣乘等想事所立舍等假想施設所引尋思。

src_original: ahamiti mameti ca vikalpaḥ katamaḥ /  yadvastu sāsravaṃ sopādānīyaṃ dīrghakālamātmato vā ātmīyato vā saṃstutamabhiniviṣṭaṃ
tgt_original: 四我分別，謂若事有漏有取，長時數習我執所聚，由數習邪執自見處事為緣所起虛妄分別。 五我所分別，謂若事有漏有取，長時數習我所執所聚，由數習邪執自見處事為緣所起虛妄分別。 六愛分別，謂緣淨妙可意事境分別。 七不愛分別，謂緣不淨妙不可意事境分別。 八愛不愛俱相違分別，謂緣淨不淨可意不可意俱離事境分別。
